fields.name: OrganisationURI
fields.title: OrganisationURI
fields.description: To identify the Local Authority within whose area the parcel of land lies.

fields.name: OrganisationLabel
fields.title: OrganisationLabel
fields.description: The name of the local authority that is identified using the OrganisationURI.

fields.name: SiteReference
fields.title: SiteReference
fields.description: A reference applied by the local authority to identify a site.

fields.name: PreviouslyPartOf
fields.title: PreviouslyPartOf
fields.description: The SiteReference that this site was previously a part of when reported on an earlier register.

fields.name: SiteNameAddress
fields.title: SiteNameAddress
fields.description: The name and address of a site, which should be sufficient to describe its location.

fields.name: SiteplanURL
fields.title: SiteplanURL
fields.description: A URL to a web page giving a site plan for the site.

fields.name: CoordinateReferenceSystem
fields.title: CoordinateReferenceSystem
fields.description: The Coordinate Reference System that is used for the fields GeoX and GeoY.

fields.name: GeoX
fields.title: GeoX
fields.description: Longitude or east grid reference for the visual centroid of the site boundary.

fields.name: GeoY
fields.title: GeoY
fields.description: Latitude or north grid reference for visual of application boundary.

fields.name: Hectares
fields.title: Hectares
fields.description: The size of the land in hectares.

fields.name: OwnershipStatus
fields.title: OwnershipStatus
fields.description: The ownership status of the land.

constraints.pattern: ^(public ownership|not in public ownership|unknown ownership|mixed ownership)$

fields.name: Deliverable
fields.title: Deliverable
fields.description: To indicate if the land is 'Deliverable'.

fields.name: PlanningStatus
fields.title: PlanningStatus
fields.description: To indicate the stage, if any, that has been reached in the planning process for the site.

fields.name: PermissionType
fields.title: PermissionType
fields.description: The latest type of permission that has been granted on the site.

constraints.pattern: ^$|^(full planning permission|outline planning permission|reserved matters approval|permission in principle|technical details consent|planning permission granted under an order|other)$

fields.name: PermissionDate
fields.title: PermissionDate
fields.description: The date permission was granted for the permission set out in the field PermissionType.

fields.name: PlanningHistory
fields.title: PlanningHistory
fields.description: Links to webpages giving information about the planning history of the site.

fields.name: ProposedForPIP
fields.title: ProposedForPIP
fields.description: To indicate if the site has been proposed for residential development (permission in principle).

fields.name: MinNetDwellings
fields.title: MinNetDwellings
fields.description: The minimum net number of dwellings that the local authority estimates the site should support.

fields.name: DevelopmentDescription
fields.title: DevelopmentDescription
fields.description: A description of any proposed housing development.

fields.name: NonHousingDevelopment
fields.title: NonHousingDevelopment
fields.description: A description of any proposed non-housing development

fields.name: Part2
fields.title: Part2
fields.description: To indicate that a site is in Part 2 of the register.

fields.name: NetDwellingsRangeFrom
fields.title: NetDwellingsRangeFrom
fields.description: The minimum net number of dwellings which, in the authority’s opinion, the land is capable of supporting.

fields.name: NetDwellingsRangeTo
fields.title: NetDwellingsRangeTo
fields.description: The maximum net number of dwellings which, in the authority’s opinion, the land is capable of supporting.

fields.name: HazardousSubstances
fields.title: HazardousSubstances
fields.description: To indicate the presence of certain characteristics of the site.

fields.name: SiteInformation
fields.title: SiteInformation
fields.description: Links to webpages giving further information about the site.

fields.name: Notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: General information about a site and its entry on the register.

fields.name: FirstAddedDate
fields.title: FirstAddedDate
fields.description: The date that the site was first added to the register.

fields.name: LastUpdatedDate
fields.title: LastUpdatedDate
fields.description: The date that information about the site was last updated.
